en.Try adjusting your search terms or filte: Try adjusting your search terms or filters
en.Create a search and click \"Save Search\: Create a search and click "Save Search" to save it.
en.Enter a name for this search: Enter a name for this search
en.Name: Name
en.Paste or type KQL directly. Click \"Appl: Paste or type KQL directly. Click "Apply to Filters" to populate filter fields.
en.Enter KQL query (e.g., name:*.pdf AND me: Enter KQL query (e.g., name:*.pdf AND mediatype:document)
en.Search timed out. Try a more specific qu: Search timed out. Try a more specific query or check if the search service is responding.
en.The search service is temporarily unavai: The search service is temporarily unavailable (503 Service Unavailable). The service may be starting up or under maintenance.
en.The search service is not responding (50: The search service is not responding (502 Bad Gateway). Please try again in a moment.
en.The search service encountered an error: The search service encountered an error (500 Internal Server Error). Please try again.
Authentication error (401 Unauthorized). Your session may have expired.
en.Unable to connect to the server. Please: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection.
en.File not found. It may have been moved o: File not found. It may have been moved or deleted.
en.Permission denied. You may not have acce: Permission denied. You may not have access to this file.
Session expired. Please log in again.
en.Clipboard API not available. Try using H: Clipboard API not available. Try using HTTPS.
en.Clipboard access denied. Please allow cl: Clipboard access denied. Please allow clipboard permissions.
en.Are you sure you want to delete \"%{name: Are you sure you want to delete "%{name}"?
en.File not found. It may have already been: File not found. It may have already been deleted.
en.Permission denied. You may not have perm: Permission denied. You may not have permission to delete this file.
File is locked. Please try again later.
en.Saved searches data is corrupted and cou: Saved searches data is corrupted and could not be loaded.
en.Storage quota exceeded. Try deleting som: Storage quota exceeded. Try deleting some saved searches.
Failed to save. Please try again.
en.The search service may be restarting or: The search service may be restarting or under maintenance
en.Wait a moment and try again: Wait a moment and try again
en.Contact your administrator if this persi: Contact your administrator if this persists
en.The server may be temporarily overloaded: The server may be temporarily overloaded
en.The server may be temporarily unavailabl: The server may be temporarily unavailable
en.Your personal storage space could not be: Your personal storage space could not be found
en.Try logging out and back in: Try logging out and back in
